descriptionTwo: This luxurious villa in the heart of Colombo features modern architecture, spacious interiors, and a beautifully landscaped garden. Equipped with a private pool, state-of-the-art kitchen, and smart home technology, it’s perfect for upscale living. Close to schools, shopping malls, and restaurants, this villa offers 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, and is located in the prestigious Colombo 7 area.

Nestled along the pristine coastline of Galle, this beachfront house offers breathtaking views of the ocean and luxurious living spaces. Featuring 6 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, a private infinity pool, and a fully equipped kitchen, the property is perfect for beach lovers seeking peace and tranquility. Just a short drive from the town center, it offers a perfect balance of luxury and convenience.

Located in the heart of Colombo, this modern apartment offers stylish living spaces with open-plan designs, 3 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms. With floor-to-ceiling windows, the apartment boasts stunning city views. Residents will enjoy access to high-end amenities including a fitness center, 24/7 security, and easy access to shopping malls, restaurants, and public transport.

Set amidst the serene hills of Kandy, this country house offers peaceful living surrounded by nature. With 4 spacious bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and an expansive garden, it provides an ideal retreat for those looking for a tranquil environment. The property includes a charming veranda, ideal for outdoor dining, and is located just a short drive from Kandy’s city center.

This luxurious penthouse, located in Colombo’s prestigious neighborhood, offers spectacular city views from every room. Featuring 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and a private rooftop pool, this property redefines urban living. With a modern, fully-equipped kitchen and a spacious living area, it is the perfect home for those who enjoy privacy and luxury in the heart of the city.

This spacious family home located in Negombo offers 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, and a large backyard with plenty of space for outdoor activities. The property features a well-designed kitchen, a living room with ample natural light, and is situated in a peaceful neighborhood. It is ideal for families looking for a comfortable and safe environment while being close to schools, shops, and the beach.

This contemporary house located in Kandy features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a spacious living room, and a modern kitchen. The property also includes a small garden and is located in a peaceful neighborhood, perfect for families. It is conveniently located near schools, shopping centers, and public transport, making it an ideal location for those who need easy access to amenities.
